root.name: Open Season
root.description: StoryThe story follows a bear by the name of Boog, who lived in the garage of a wildlife officer. After getting into trouble while following the advice of an antlered mule named Elliot, Boog is kicked out of the garage and forced into the wilderness. The player then has to help Boog find his way home while avoiding waterfalls, dangerous creatures, and the occasional hunter.
